system.login-banner: You have accessed a protected system. Log off immediately if you are not an authorized user.

entry.name: cisco-sxp
entry.description: The Security Group Tag (SGT) Exchange Protocol (SXP) is one of several protocols that supports Cisco TrustSec. SXP is a control protocol for propagating IP-to-SGT binding information across network devices that do not have the capability to tag packets.

entry.name: coinimp
entry.description: Coinimp is a javascript miner that is embedded in websites and uses CPU resources while you visit such sites to mine the monero cryptocurrency. This App-ID identifies such mining activity giving you the ability to get visibility into such traffic and block it in an enterprise environment.

entry.name: ed137-ptt-off-squ-off
entry.description: Indicates if ED-137 PTT is OFF and SQU is OFF.

entry.description: ED-137 is an interoperability standard for VoIP Air Traffic Management (ATM) radio components developed by The European Organisation for Civil Aviation Equipment (EUROCAE).

entry.name: ed137
entry.description: ED-137 is an interoperability standard for VoIP Air Traffic Management (ATM) radio components developed by The European Organisation for Civil Aviation Equipment (EUROCAE).

entry.description: Indicates if ED-137 PTT is OFF and SQU is ON.

entry.description: Indicates if ED-137 PTT is ON and SQU is OFF.

entry.name: ed137-ptt-on-squ-on
entry.description: Indicates if ED-137 PTT is ON and SQU is ON.

entry.name: gb2pp-ptt-off
entry.description: Indicates GB2PP PTT OFF signal.

entry.name: gb2pp-base
entry.description: GB2PP is a signaling protocol for Rohde&Schwarz radio stations. It is used to set and retrieve parameters and states to/from radio stations.

entry.name: gb2pp
entry.description: GB2PP is a signaling protocol for Rohde&Schwarz radio stations. It is used to set and retrieve parameters and states to/from radio stations.

entry.name: gb2pp-ptt-on
entry.description: Indicates GB2PP PTT ON signal.

entry.name: gb2pp-tone-off
entry.description: Indicates GB2PP Tone OFF signal.

entry.name: gb2pp-tone-on
entry.description: Indicates GB2PP Tone ON signal.

entry.name: globus
entry.description: Globus Connect enables your system to use the Globus file transfer and sharing service. It makes your machine into a Globus endpoint on practically any system. This App-ID covers Globus Connect Personal, which is designed for use by a single user on a personal machine, and Globus Web Console.

entry.name: helprace
entry.description: Helprace is a tool for customer service support. This app-id covers traffic between the helprace browser client and the helprace servers.

entry.name: helpscout
entry.description: Help Scout is a help desk software providing an email-based customer support platform, knowledge base tool, and an embeddable search/contact widget for customer service professionals. This app-id controls traffic from the helpscout web-client or mobile phone app to the helpscout servers.

entry.name: hpe-bsa
entry.description: BSA(Business Server Automation) HPE Server Automation (HPE SA) automates tasks like provisioning, patching, configuring, and release management of servers and application servers. Server Automation (SA) is a data center automation software that centralizes and streamlines many data center functions and automates critical areas of data center\'s server management.

entry.name: ipfs
entry.description: InterPlanetary File System (IPFS) is a protocol and network designed to create a content-addressable, peer-to-peer method of storing and sharing hypermedia in a distributed file system. IPFS aims to replace HTTP and provide web service without centralization.

entry.name: kafka
entry.description: Apache Kafka is an open-source stream-processing software platform developed by the Apache Software Foundation, written in Scala and Java. The project aims to provide a unified, high-throughput, low-latency platform for handling real-time data feeds. Apache Kafka is based on the commit log, and it allows users to subscribe to it and publish data to any number of systems or real-time applications.

entry.name: linkedin-editing
entry.description: The Linkedin-editing identifies the editing activity on the LinkedIn website and mobile apps which includes editing the profile info, changing the profile picture, editing or deleting the existing posts.

entry.name: panorama-interconnect
entry.description: The Panorama™ Interconnect plugin enables you to establish a Panorama Controller that manages Panorama Nodes and centralizes configuration management for consistent firewall configurations and policies across large-scale firewall deployments.

entry.name: protonmail
entry.description: ProtonMail is an end-to-end encrypted email service. ProtonMail uses client-side encryption to protect email contents and user data before they are sent to ProtonMail servers, unlike other common email providers such as Gmail and Outlook.com.

entry.name: secs-gem
entry.description: This app-id identifies SECS/GEM(SEMI Equipment Communication Standard/Generic Equipment Model) protocol traffic.

entry.name: twitter-editing
entry.description: The Twitter-editing application identifies traffic associated with user activity on Twitter for updating the profile info and deleteing the existing profile picture.

entry.name: twitter-uploading
entry.description: The Twitter-uploading application identifies traffic associated with user activity on Twitter for uploading the profile picture, uploading picture or video in a tweet.

entry.name: vmware-update
entry.description: VMware vSphere Update Manager (VUM) is software for automating patch management which enables centralized, automated patch and version management for VMware vSphere and offers support for VMware ESXi hosts, virtual machines, and virtual appliances. Update Manager Download Service (UMDS) provides the bridge for vSphere Update Manager to receive its patch and update binaries. This appid covers the traffic between public VMware server and VUM or UMDS, but does not cover the internal traffic between VCenter, VUM, UMDS, and managed ESXi hosts.

entry.name: bbc-streaming
entry.description: BBC streaming covers video streaming traffic from different BBC websites such as BBC iPlayer or BBC News.

entry.name: coinhave
entry.description: Coinhave is a javascript miner that is embedded in websites and uses CPU resources while you visit such sites to mine the monero cryptocurrency. This App-ID identifies such mining activity giving you the ability to get visibility into such traffic and block it in an enterprise environment.

entry.name: fidelity-active-trader-pro
entry.description: Fidelity Active Trader Pro is a trading tool which is used for a real-time streaming account, order, and market data updates with a customizable desktop platform. This AppID covers traffic generated from this app.

entry.name: harvest
entry.description: Harvest is a web-based tool for time tracking, invoicing, expense tracking, and time-based reporting.

entry.name: infusionsoft
entry.description: Infusionsoft is an e-mail marketing and sales platform for small businesses. This app-id identifies traffic between the infusionsoft servers and the mobile phone app and web-browser client.

entry.name: intervals
entry.description: Intervals is a time tracking application. This app-id controls traffic between the intervals servers and the intervals web browser client.

entry.name: ivef
entry.description: Inter VTS Exchange Format (IVEF) Service is a transmission framework for the exchange of vessel traffic information between shore-based e-Navigation systems, such as VTS systems, eNavigation stakeholders and relevant external parties. This App-ID identifies the network communication between IP server (data collection), Ship positioning system and Harbor Application server.

entry.name: sel-fast-messaging
entry.description: Schweitzer Engineering Labs ("SEL") manufactures and sells digital protective relay equipment for use in industrial high-voltage installations. SEL Fast Messaging protocol evolved over time as a (semi) proprietary method for auto-configuration of connected SEL devices for retrieval of analog and digital status data. The protocol itself supports embedded binary messages slip-streamed in the data stream with normal ASCII text data. A combination of both are used for full auto-configuration of devices.

entry.name: sentinelone
entry.description: SentinelOne is a software used to secure endpoint devices against targeted attacks and provides forensics to understand the nature of such attacks. The SentinelOne agent is the component of endpoint security installed on endpoint computers and communicates with the management server. This AppID covers the traffic between the agent and the management server.

entry.name: Hosts Visiting Malicious Sites
entry.caption: Hosts Visiting Malicious Sites
entry.query: (category eq command-and-control) or (category eq hacking) or (category eq malware) or (category eq phishing)

entry.name: Hosts Visiting Threat Cats
entry.caption: Hosts Visiting Threat Cats
entry.query: (category eq dynamic-dns) or (category eq parked) or (category eq unknown)
entry.description: Traffic destined for URL categories - DDns, Parked, or Unknown

entry.name: WildFire Malicious Verdicts
entry.caption: WildFire Malicious Verdicts
entry.query: (verdict eq malicious) or (verdict eq phishing)
entry.description: All WildFire verdicts that are either malicious or phishing

entry.name: WildFire verdicts SMTP
entry.caption: WildFire verdicts SMTP
entry.query: (app eq smtp)

entry.name: Clients sinkholed
entry.caption: Clients sinkholed
entry.description: Traffic leaving network destined to Sinkhole address

entry.name: Used Rules
entry.caption: Used Rules
entry.query: (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: All rules being used

entry.name: Inbound Non-Working-Traffic
entry.caption: Inbound Non-Working-Traffic
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and ((app eq incomplete) or (app eq insufficient-data) or (app eq not-applicable) or (action eq deny) or (action eq drop))
entry.description: Optional: What is trying to access internal servers. Not scheduled.

entry.name: Inbound Used Rules
entry.caption: Inbound Used Rules
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Rules being used by traffic sourced from Internet

entry.name: Inbound Traffic - All
entry.caption: Inbound Traffic - All
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)

entry.name: Inbound Traffic - SSL
entry.caption: Inbound Traffic - SSL
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app eq ssl)

entry.name: Inbound Insufficient Data-Rule
entry.caption: Inbound Insufficient Data-Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app eq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Internet traffic where application not determined (insufficient-data, incomplete, or not-applicable)

entry.name: Inbound Rules wURL Filtering
entry.caption: Inbound Rules wURL Filtering

entry.name: iron-skillet-version
entry.comments: version 1.0.3: version of this iron-skillet template file

ip.description: IPv4 addresses that should not be routed across the Internet. Either reserved IP address space or unassigned and may be used for malicious purposes. More information: http://www.team-cymru.com/bogon-reference.html

IPv6 addresses that should not be routed across the Internet. Either reserved IP address space or unassigned and may be used for malicious purposes. More information: http://www.team-cymru.com/bogon-reference.html

entry.name: Exception-AV
entry.description: Use this profile for rules needing modifications to the standard

entry.name: NO-Decrypt Rule
entry.description: This rule does not do Decryption. This rule is validating SSL Protocol Communications.

entry.name: Outbound Block Rule
entry.description: Block outbound sessions with destination address matching one of the Palo Alto Networks external dynamic lists for high risk and known malicious IP addresses.

entry.name: Inbound Block Rule
entry.description: Block inbound sessions with source address matching one of the Palo Alto Networks external dynamic lists for high risk and known malicious IP addresses.

entry.name: DNS Sinkhole Block
entry.description: Block outbound sessions that match a malicious domain and have been redirected to a configured sinkhole IP address.

entry.name: Outbound Bogon Block Rule
entry.description: Block outbound sessions with a destination address matching a known bogon address that should not be transitting the firewall. Add known exceptions to the rule before activating.

entry.name: Inbound Bogon Block Rule
entry.description: Block inbound sessions with a source address matching a known bogon address that should not be transitting the firewall. Add known exceptions to the rule before activating.

entry.name: NO-Decrypt URL Categories
entry.description: This rule does not do Decryption. This rule is validating SSL Protocol Communications.
